newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures erase gains again, move lower.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures erase gains again, move lower.

text.p: Jan 29 - U.S. debt futures erased gains and again moved to the minus side. Traders said one dealer had bought some 2,000 March futures after the inflation-index cash note auction that hoisted March futures from about 110-09/32 to 110-19/32. Locals then pressed the contract back down amid a lack of bids in erratic trade. Some said charts portend more losses soon. ((DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com))
